LanguageData.GatherYieldDesc: The amount of milk or wool yielded from this creature.
LanguageData.ValueTooltop: Gene value. Applied to animal's base stats.
LanguageData.ParentTooltop: The parental value this animal inherited from. Will be empty for wild or newly generated animals with no parents.
LanguageData.Settings1Tooltip: Randomly selected from a normal distribution with these settings...
LanguageData.Settings2Tooltip: Added/subtracted from inherited genes. Randomly selected from a normal distribution with these settings...
LanguageData.ColorNormalTooltip: Traditional red, yellow, green color scheme.
LanguageData.ColorRPGTooltip: RPG style item quality color scheme.
LanguageData.HumanlikeGenesTooltip: Gives genes to all humanlike pawns as well as animals.
